name: Takua 64
description: Takua 64 (Bionicle64) is a major SM64 ROM Hack created by Superstupidy. It is a total conversion mod of the world of Bionicle, including environment and level design inspired by games like Metroid Prime, Tomb Raider, and the majority of Bionicle games. With 99 "Toa Stones" to find and collect, this hack features 12 levels, each with multiple areas to explore and challenges to overcome. Most of the followed characters are replaced/designed based on Bionicle's world while still keeping Mario 64's gimmick aspect and gameplay style.
